name: Alternativa Player 3D Export File
summary: Learn about .A3D files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Select Export to A3D in the top left corner of the window.
In the "Export to A3D" dialog box, select Export.
In the next "Export to A3D" dialog box, select Save the file.
In the next dialog box, choose the file name, save location, and then click Save.
File is held in the folder in the ZIP file.
To load and view the A3D fuel:
Select Load model in the top left corner of the window.
In the next dialog box, navigate to the location of your A3D file, select Open.
If a "Missing textures" dialog box opens, you have two options: select Continue to continue without the texture or select Pick textures to load the .ATF file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
